alert.note: Alert for Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; Lower Washington County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:20PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of a trace up to locally two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lower Washington County and Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Occasional winter driving conditions can be expected ininto Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; Lower Washington County
